statements: SELECT * FROM recycling_program_participants;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name FROM recycling_program_participants ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT city, state, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM recycling_program_participants GROUP BY city, state;
SELECT last_name, first_name, city FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT * FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY'
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE state IN ('CA', 'FL', 'TX') ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT participant_id, city FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE city != 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'CA'
SELECT * FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name
SELECT * FROM recycling_program_participants;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM recycling_program_participants ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE age < 30 AND city = 'New York';
SELECT participant_id, first_name, join_date FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, city FROM recycling_programs WHERE end_date IS NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC

SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM recycling_program_participants JOIN recycling_programs ON recycling_program_participants.program_id = recycling_programs.program_id WHERE recycling_programs.city = 'New York' AND join_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY program_name
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM recycling_program_participants GROUP BY city HAVING total_participants > 5 ORDER BY total_participants DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, city FROM recycling_program_participants WHERE city IN ('Houston', 'Los Angeles')
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProgramParticipants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, age FROM RecyclingProgramParticipants ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_name, gender, address FROM RecyclingProgramParticipants WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT location_name, location_address, contact_person FROM RecyclingProgramLocations;
SELECT stats_id, participant_id, recycling_quantity, recycling_date FROM RecyclingProgramStats ORDER BY recycling_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProgramParticipants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT participant_name, age FROM RecyclingProgramParticipants WHERE gender = 'Female';

SELECT participant_name, recycling_quantity, recycling_date FROM RecyclingProgramParticipants JOIN RecyclingProgramStats ON RecyclingProgramParticipants.participant_id = RecyclingProgramStats.participant_id;
SELECT location_name, location_address, contact_person, contact_number FROM RecyclingProgramLocations WHERE location_name LIKE 'City%';
SELECT * FROM RecyclingProgramParticipants WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM demographic_info WHERE city='New York';
SELECT name, age FROM demographic_info WHERE occupation='Engineer';
SELECT program_name, sponsor FROM recycling_programs WHERE sponsor='Eco Company' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, city FROM program_participants WHERE age > 30 AND city='Los Angeles';
SELECT program_id, success FROM recycling_attempts WHERE success=true;
SELECT name, age, city, occupation FROM demographic_info;
SELECT * FROM recycling_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, sponsor, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE sponsor='Green Earth';
SELECT name, city FROM program_participants WHERE age > 25 AND city='New York';
SELECT name, program_name, recycling_date FROM program_participants JOIN recycling_attempts ON program_participants.participant_id = recycling_attempts.participant_id ORDER BY recycling_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM persons;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM persons WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM recycling_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population < 100000;
SELECT * FROM persons;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM persons WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM persons ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_records JOIN recycling_materials ON recycling_records.material_id = recycling_materials.material_id WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT city_name, population FROM cities WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY population DESC;
